articles.title: CVS to play key role in getting COVID vaccine to long-term care residents in Florida - WEAR
articles.description: CVS Health is playing a key role in getting the vaccines to long-term care facilities and 11 other states. During the pandemic, we’ve seen photo after photo of nursing home residents, visiting their loved ones through glass windows. Caption: WEAR. CVS H…
